II: HistoryII: HistoryThe Creation of Inannak

Chapter 4: Origins

The origins of the world of Inannak are lost in time. Its creation is forgotten by all except perhaps some among the gods. All that remain are contradictory tales told by storytellers and cantors of the old faiths. Collected here are summaries of three myths.

  • The Four Eggs
